it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ClientEvent>

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<ClientEvent>
    Class for checking the correctness of the action of the players, according to MVC pattern
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Method Detail

      • findPlayerWithThisNickname

        public Player findPlayerWithThisNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method finds the player who has the nickname that is passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the player that is looked for
        Returns:
        the player that is looked for
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when nickname parameter isn't associated to a player

      • findSquaresReachableWithThisMovements

        void findSquaresReachableWithThisMovements(Square currentPosition,
                                           int numOfMovements,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<Square> listOfSquareReachable)
        Finds the squares that can be reached with the number of movements that are passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - start position
        numOfMovements - number of the movements usable to reach the squares
        listOfSquareReachable - It is filled with the reachable squares

      • isTheTurnOfThisPlayer

        boolean isTheTurnOfThisPlayer(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method checks if is the turn of the player who has the nickname that is passed
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the player
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if it is the turn of the player with the nickname parameter

      • substituteWeaponsCardWithTheirAlias

        java.util.ArrayList<ServerEvent.AliasCard> substituteWeaponsCardWithTheirAlias(java.util.ArrayList<WeaponCard> weapons)

      • handleTheEndOfAnAction

        void handleTheEndOfAnAction(boolean endOfUsePUCard)
        Handles the end of the action and checks if the player has to do other actions sending the correct request or calls the update of the turn through the round controller.
        Parameters:
        endOfUsePUCard - It's true if the method is called following the use of a power up card.

      • isSomeoneDied

        private boolean isSomeoneDied()
        Check if someone during the turn died.
        Returns:
        True if some players died during the turn, false otherwise.

      • sendRequestForAction

        void sendRequestForAction()
        Sends to the player the request to do an action, checking what he can do and what he can't.

      • sendRequestToDrawPowerUpCard

        public void sendRequestToDrawPowerUpCard(Player playerHasToDraw,
                                         int numOfPowerUpCardToDraw)
        Sends to the player the request to draw a power up card to be spawn.
        Parameters:
        playerHasToDraw - The player that has to draw the power up card.
        numOfPowerUpCardToDraw - The number of power up cards that the player has to draw.

      • checkIfThisWeaponIsUsable

        boolean checkIfThisWeaponIsUsable(WeaponCard weaponCard,
                                  int movementCanDoBeforeReloadAndShoot)
        Check if the weapon passed by parameter is usable in the current situation of the player that own it.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - Weapon card involved in the check.
        movementCanDoBeforeReloadAndShoot - The movement that the player could do before to shoot.
        Returns:
        True if the weapon is usable by player, false otherwise.

      • checkIfPlayerCanShoot

        boolean checkIfPlayerCanShoot(java.util.ArrayList<WeaponCard> weaponDeck)
        Check if the player of the turn can shoot checking if there is at least one of his weapon usable.
        Parameters:
        weaponDeck - Weapon deck of the player that could want to shoot.
        Returns:
        True if the player can shoot, false otherwise.

      • setTimerForTurn

        void setTimerForTurn(boolean isForFirstRound,
                     boolean isForRegeneration)
        Sets the timer for the turn at the begin of the turn of a player.
        Parameters:
        isForFirstRound - It's true if the timer it will be active for the first turn of the player adding to the normal time a minute, false otherwise.
        isForRegeneration - It's true if the timer it will be active only for the spawn after a death dividing the normal time for three, false otherwise.

      • handleDisconnection

        public void handleDisconnection(java.lang.String nicknameOfPlayerDisconnected)
        Handles the disconnection of a client, marking false the boolean attribute that specify if a player is connected or not and removing the nickname of the player involved from the list of the nicknames in the game.
        Parameters:
        nicknameOfPlayerDisconnected - The nickname of the player disconnected.

      • handleReconnection

        public void handleReconnection(java.lang.String nicknameOfPlayer)
        Handles the reconnection of the client marking the boolean attribute that specifies if the player is connected or not and adding again him to the list of the nickname in the game.
        Parameters:
        nicknameOfPlayer - The nickname of the player reconnected.

      • update

        public void update(ClientEvent message)

        This method handles the messages that VirtualView sends to Controller.

        It recognize which specific controller have to be called to handle the message through the if case.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer<ClientEvent>
        Parameters:
        message - it contains the type of action that the player has done.
